entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong X509 chain selected when we have multiple viable options #59584
  • Error creating optimised runtime package store #59573
  • [mono] Make it possible to switch execution from interpreter to JIT #59571
    7.0.0
  • C# string formatting with negative numbers are not working as expected in net5.0 #59570
  • We want to add a new CPU-architecture for dotnet #59561
    Future
  • Improve superpmi scripts #59559
    7.0.0
  • emsdk failure: emcmake not found #59556
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\NotRMW_do\\NotRMW_do.cmd #59555
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [QUIC] Use client TLS options in QUIC #32069
    7.0.0
  • JsonSourceGenerator runs twice? #59539
  • System.Text.Json: Guid from JsonElement not valid. #59474
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails when targetting multiple frameworks without referencing STJ #59140
  • Enum field parses successfully but not a property #59582
  • Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #57983
    5.0.x
  • [Net6 - RC1] Json Source Generator - JsonSerializerContext Breaking Change? #59177
  • Postinstall script fails on osx-arm64 #59581
  • Exporting a X509Certificate2Collection with PKCS7 on Windows produces DER with trailing zeros #59212
    7.0.0
  • X509Certificate2Collection PKCS7 export throws on macOS if empty #59206
    7.0.0
  • Is/can format strings benefit from interpolated string optimizations? #59567
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #59448
    7.0.0
  • AccessViolation trying to compile calling instance methods on large value types with Reflection.Emit #59554
  • AssemblyName.CodeBase is ignored in LoadFromAssemblyName #59565
  • SqlClient shows degraded performances with a simple SELECT query when enabling MARS #59558
  • Standalone JIT build #59426
  • DOTNET_ vs COMPlus_ env var prefix for creating dumps #58924
    7.0.0
  • LoggerMessage source generator fails when using file scoped namespace declarations #59551

PullRequests

Created

  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1385206 #59588
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests] Fix PlatformDetection.IsMonoInterpreter for mobile #59587
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 #59578
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DNM] Use Helix staging for testing Dev WF functionality #59576
  • CI matrix change: add openSUSE 15.2 #59574
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #59572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adjust SkipOnCoreClr for Match_ExcessPrefix test #59564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] windows: Fail the build if provisioning fails #59560
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix ArrayPool leak with JsonDocument #59568
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • enable client certificate tests for QUIC on Linux #59544
    os-linux, test enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [main] [Release/6.0] Throw error if assembly version for ref pack assemblies doesnot match assembly version shipped in 6.0.0 #59583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix behavior ObjectCollection for single item contains #59557
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Delete unused file #59585
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0-rc2] File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59532
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59523
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix krb5 library SO name in the gss api shim #59566
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] XmlSerializer support for IsDynamicCodeSupported=false #59507
    api-approved, area-Serialization
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add license banner to source. #59586
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add a note about rerunning the license/cla check #59440
    area-Meta
  • Fix behavior ObjectCollection for single item contains #59547
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix ArrayPool leak with JsonDocument #59540
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Add link dependencies for dotnet.js #59470
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix BinderTracingTest #59550
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Throw error if assembly version for ref pack assemblies doesnot match assembly version shipped in 6.0.0 #59535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add execute bit to postinstall script #59552
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59436
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Improve ReliabilityFramework #59384
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Merge main into feature/use-dllimport-generator #59577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Fix PKCS7 export quirks #59217
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add a no-cache backed CLRConfig lookup mechanism #59513
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable System.SpanTests.SpanTests.FillNativeBytes #59563
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix krb5 library SO name in the gss api shim #59526
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Remove unused emitter call types and improve INS_tail_i_jmp handling #59495
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum.HasFlags and Enum.Equals in C# #59514
  • Update area owners to include new owners of S.DS.* #59357
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Add execute bit to postinstall script #59553
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Port DllImportGenerator to dotnet/runtime #59363
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Fixes, and improvements based on user feedback #59486
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • Reduce allocations in VersionConverter #55564
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add InstallLocation component to host #59537
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Additional RPMs for CBL-Mariner #59548
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 5.0.x
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run iOS x64 on OSX11 scouting queue #59528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run Catalyst ARM64 tests on macOS 12, just to see what happens #59502
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst, os-macos-monterey (macOS12)
  • Use new cross-build images for arm/arm64 builds #59534
    community-contribution
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: SSA for branching #1404

PullRequests

Created

  • Some cleanup/commenting in SymbolicRegexMatcher #1595
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1594

Merged

  • Align trimming settings with IL Linker #1596
    area-NativeAOT
  • Transition regex support #1593
  • Add guards against stack overflows in various NonBackTracking algorithms #1589
  • Switch to shared System.Enum implementation #1590

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, sdk #sdk-110982-.NET5SDK5.0.2xx #21399
  • `dotnet watch run` throws AFTER CTRL-C #21397
  • `dotnet tool install -a arm64` fails #21395
    6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet run -a` doesn't work well from x64 #21393
    6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet tool install -a` works great #21392
  • `dotnet test --arch x64` fails #21391
  • [Breaking change] Consider giving `-a` to `--arch` instead of `--test-adapter-path` #21389
  • [6.0.100-rc.2.21472.34] nuke global tool app fails to restore #21362
  • Please add `--source` to dotnet tool install #21355
  • dotnet-serve tool does not work on macOS Arm64 #21349
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-sdk-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #sdk-110573-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #21343

Closed

  • dotnet workload install takes an incredible amount of time after updating the sdk #21319

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up client/server shutdown #21390
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1384972 #21388
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1384832 #21387
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Bash shebang for scripts to run under FreeBSD #21361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix failure when manifest that is expected to exist isn't found #21358
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
    Area-Install, Area-Workloads
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.2xx #20863
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix workload nuget retry issue #21329
    Area-Workloads
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21310
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create UpdateToNewTargetFramework.md #21103
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385519 #21400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Support project context for roslyn LSP outside of VS #56711
    Backlog
  • Handle satellite assemblies in analyzer loader #56708
  • [DoesNotReturn] warning is only reported in nullable-enabled context #56706
  • 'override' completion not working for source generated methods in Visual Studio 2022 #56702
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability issues in anonymous types' assignments through 'with' expressions #56701
  • No way to suppress CS8655 (switch is not exhaustive on null) #56699
  • Correct resolving of delegates and values parameters #56697
  • Add support for a nuget package to say it does not support HotReload #56681
  • Add a means to disable HoReload at the solution/project level #56679
  • EditorConfig GUI doesn't save changes #56676

Closed

  • Unexpected value 'FunctionType' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.ConversionKind' in .NET 6 RC1 (works in .NET 5.0) #56407
    17.0
  • Inheritance Margin tooltip polishing #54454
    17.0
  • hot reload does not support IL weavers #56678
  • Method type inference should make inference from explicit lambda return type #54257
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix automation names for items in the Value Tracking tree #56717
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid emitting compilation options and references to EnC deltas #56713
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make serializable option almost only a mapping from option keys to values. #56710
    Area-IDE
  • Set the width of Inheritance Margin to 18 #56709
    Area-IDE
  • adding missing options #56707
    Area-IDE
  • Target interactive host and tests to net6.0 #56705
    Area-Interactive
  • Filter out results from progression/lsp with docs that we can't get uris for #56700
    Area-IDE
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Only force compute document diagnostics for the requ… #56696
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Respond to editor classification changes #56683
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Explicitly report an exception on the host side when nav-to crashes #56682
    Area-IDE
  • Tighten enforcement of naming convention for local functions #56680
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1382495 #56677

Merged

  • Make 'Languages' not part of hte state of an optionset #56489
    Area-IDE
  • Skip flaky test #56719
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove workaround for intellicode server activation in integrationtests #56720
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56715
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Register missing encoding providers for core host #56718
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56691
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update references for public 17.0 Preview 4 release #56626
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove option state that is redundant with existing field #56654
    Area-IDE
  • Add comment on usage of SLocalRegistry service on background thread #56591
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56704
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56703
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56689
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Method type inference should make inference from explicit lambda return type #56534
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56693

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56724

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fallback logic for TryParse and BindAsync is inconsistent #36957
  • Update darc subscription after Preview5 release #36953
    17.1-Preview1
  • Blazor Publish Issue When Referencing Net Framework 4.8 Library #36952
  • Refactor OnTypeFormatting code into C# formatting pass #36947
  • Investigate optimizations to tag helper discovery #36946
  • Update to stable LanguageSErver.Client.Implementation assembly #36945
    17.0-Preview5
  • Increased Build Times in net6.0 RC2 over RC1 (`rc.1.21416.1`) #36944
  • Startup improvement: endpoint, json #36943
  • Startup regression: https #36942
  • Tag Helper enum attribute produces false IntelliCode CS0103 in a razor page in Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3.1 #36937
    6.0.0
  • Support finding & calling static TryParse/BindAsync methods for parameter binding of RequestDelegateFactory parameters from interfaces implemented by the target parameter type #36935
    6.0-rc2
  • Signout doesn't redirect to redirect uri specified in authentication properties. #36934
  • Flaky test - WriteAfterConnectionCloseNoops-http_127.0.0.1_0 #36931
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support all nonbubbling events #36928
  • Can't add new Identity Scaffolded item to project #36927
  • SignalR tests fail against OpenSSL 3.0 #36921
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware does not log response headers when log response body #36920
    .NET 7 Planning
  • MVC model validation in default configuration is very slow if models contain delegate properties #36919
  • SignalR can not get user identifier from ClaimsPrincipal #36918
  • [Blazor] Include a checkbox for WebAssemblyPrerendered in the New Project Wizard #36915
    .NET 7 Planning
  • VS Hot reload "Restart Application" VS gesture behaves badly #36914
  • Existing hot reload deltas aren't applied until after the application starts #36913
  • Perf improvement: caching #36911
  • support partial class or can use on endpoint to two or more class? #36910

Closed

  • Closing / deleting a Razor file does not clear diagnostics. #36940
    17.0-Preview5
  • Single sign on with Kerberos does not work on Firefox #36878
  • Make Blazor component attribute completion prioritize component attributes #35848
    17.0-Preview5
  • Incorrect Completion Items After Selecting Attribute Transition (@...) Completion Item #30255
    17.0-Preview5
  • Startup regression: caching #36644
  • Blazor WASM media onPlay event not firing #20983
    6.0-rc2
  • Onended Event Blazor didn't fire. #24323
    6.0-rc2
  • Add easier way to name endpoints for easier link generation #33687
    6.0-rc1
  • Both flavors of webapi project should use Swashbuckle defaults #36819
    6.0-rc2
  • Treating IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName as an assembly name for some reason? #36883
  • Startup regression: mvc #36790

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36959
  • [release/6.0] Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36958
  • Fix BoundAttributDescriptor.GetHashCode and add test (#36679) #36956
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36955
  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #36954
    * NO MERGE *
  • Go back to alpine 3.12 #36951
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix http logging log typo #36950
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix alpine queue used for Helix #36939
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine WriteAfterConnectionCloseNoops on Libuv #36933
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Support more nonbubbling media events #36926
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Backport Fix Missing `RZ10012` diagnostic for components written in certain cultures #36949
    area-mvc, area-razor.compiler, 7.0-preview1
  • Update spa-templates submodule to reference 6.0 branch #36932
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36948
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Fix alpine queue used for Helix #36929
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix Missing `RZ10012` diagnostic for components written in certain cultures #36907
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve Results.Problem and Results.ValidationProblem APIs (#36856) #36930
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Scope ActivityListener in test to not interfere with other tests #36908
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update container used for Linux Musl #31599
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add crossgen-packages with FreeBSD RIDs #36909
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • RC2 Tooling Support for Support Localized Component Names #36936
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Border with RoundRectangle doesn't use CornerRadius or Clip content #2694
  • [Bug] Elements wrapped with Border inside of CollectionView don't render. #2693
  • [Bug] Border sizes to container instead of wrapping content #2692
  • [Bug] Border with Ellipse shape isn't sized correctly #2691
  • [Bug] Border StrokeShape needs typeconverter for XAML #2690
  • [Bug] Border's "GetVisualChildren" returns no child elements. #2689
  • [Enhancement] implement IIncrementalGenerator #2688
  • Make Item Templates visible in Visual Studio #2686
  • [Enhancement] Switch track color should be lighter on hover #2685
  • Maui Check workload update failed #2684
  • Project default not run with Android #2680

Closed

  • [Bug] Backward and laggy typing on Android #2683
  • Android `Entry` inserts character at the start of text #2654
  • [Bug] Breakpoints not working #2682
  • [Bug] Cannot run MAUI on IOS Simulator #2681
  • [Bug] Unable to change App Icon in IOS iPad #2616
  • Templates should have `(Preview)` in the title / name #2660
    6.0.101-preview.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Arrange implementations for layouts now return size which accounts for Fill #2687
    6.0.101-preview.9

Merged

  • Remove Device.OpenUri implementation and Device.Flags/SetFlags #2651

  • Implement more WinUI SwitchHandler properties #1007
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2679
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Border control #2445
  • Add (Preview) to MAUI template names for now #2676
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.101-preview.9

Updated

  • Add ApplicationHandler #2653
  • Picker Vertical Text Alignment #1194
  • Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled in WinUI Entry #1477
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Implement ThumbColor property in WinUI Slider #1149
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Update the W A SDK #2668
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Port Editor.HorizontalTextAlignment to Handler #840
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄
